title: Milksop Alley
description: Nine year-old Daniel Singer is traumatized when he is bitten by a man whom he suspects is a werewolf. By the time he is seventeen, he has to leave his home in Michigan because he has killed so many people. He moves to Chicago and becomes Joey Luna. All Joey has ever wanted was to find a Father Figure, because his own Dad abandoned he and his Mom when he was two years old. Joey meets all sorts of men in the big city, especially in a dangerous place called Milksop Alley. But one question Is Daniel Singer/Joey Luna the product of a werewolf bite or is it all in his mind? Either way, his bloodlust rises whenever he gets mad. And this isn't good for the denizens of Milksop Alley or anyplace else. This is the story of a young boy who becomes a man. Or does he eventually make the full transformation into a wolf? Terror, sex, and lust drive this suspenseful story of an Urban Killer who is a little bit of Man and Beast.
author: Angus Thorn
